DOC.brief_summary: To examine variation rate Non-HDL KI1107 comparison Rosuvastatin monotherapy .
DOC.brief_title: Evaluate Efficacy Safety KI1107 Patients Whose TG Level Not Adequately Controlled With Rosuvastatin Calcium Monotherapy While LDL-C Properly Controlled
DOC.detailed_description: Study design : Randomly assign two group ( KI1107 Rosuvastatin monotherpy ) 4 week run-in period prescribe KI1107 Rosuvastatin 8 week .
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criterion : Screening Visit Age : 1980 High risk cardiovascular disease accord NCEP APT III TG≥130mg/dL 160mg/dL > LDLC≥100mg/dL subject take statin 4 week 500mg/dL > TG≥200mg/dL LDLC < 110mg/dL subject take statin 4 week Baseline Visit 500mg/dL > TG≥200mg/dL LDLC < 110mg/dL Reduction LDLC dompairng screen visit Exclusion criterion : The patient history acute artery disease within 3 month The patient history operation revasculatiation aneurysm within 6 month The patient history Unexplained myaliga diagnose myalgia rhabdomyolysis The patient histories Effectable disease procedrue clinical trial result
